title: Bug 49299 Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect statement about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299 Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The bug report does not provide any observed behavior details.
EB: The expected behavior is for the custom cookie name to affect URL rewriting, but the current implementation in the trunk uses the default cookie name 'jsessionid' instead.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file.
2. Access the URL 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/'.
